mapper.sql: oid, year_id, assess_user, assess_type, state, create_time
mapper.insert:
insert into t_assess_state
oid,
year_id,
assess_user,
assess_type,
state,
create_time,
#{oid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{yearId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{assessUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{assessType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update t_assess_state
year_id = #{yearId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
assess_user = #{assessUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
assess_type = #{assessType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where oid = #{oid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_assess_state set year_id = #{yearId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, assess_user = #{assessUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, assess_type = #{assessType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where oid = #{oid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT tas.* FROM t_assess_state AS tas WHERE tas.year_id = #{yearId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND tas.assess_user = #{assessUser,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND tas.assess_type = #{assessType,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY tas.oid DESC LIMIT 1
